attributes.action: adopt all unadopted roads within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many unadopted roads within the UK have 
poor or even a lack of their basic necessities such as drainage and street lighting aswell as consisting of pot holes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with local authorities.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
